articles.author: David L. Stern, Serhii Korolchuk
articles.title: Europe furious as deadly Russian attack damages prominent Kyiv offices - The Washington Post
articles.description: At least 18 people, including four children, were killed in the attack that involved hypersonic missiles and drones.
articles.content: KYIV Russian forces pummeled Kyiv overnight into Thursday, sending wave after wave of airborne attacks at targets in the capital and across the country, killing at least 18 including four children an… [+49 chars]

articles.author: Barak Ravid
articles.title: European ministers tell U.S. they'll trigger "snapback" sanctions against Iran - Axios
articles.description: The "snapback" mechanism automatically reimposes all UN Security Council sanctions that were lifted under the 2015 Iran nuclear deal.
articles.content: France, Germany, and the U.K. sent a letter Thursday morning to members of the UN Security Council announcing they are triggering the "snapback" mechanism to reimpose UN sanctions on Iran, which had … [+2890 chars]
